QuestData.Title: Afterlife Goes On
QuestData.Description:
A new dawn shines on Bastion. I had my reservations, but you have proven that honor yet remains in Maldraxxus.
Take my hand once more. I will return you to the temple's entrance.
Let all Maldraxxi know of our victory. And for the sake of peace, ensure that this never happens again.
QuestData.LogDescription: Fly with Xandria to the entrance of the Temple of Courage.

Objectives.Objective: Fly with Xandria to the Temple of Courage
